House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08894
FULL TITLE : AN ACT EXEMPTING PETROLEUM PRODUCTS FROM VALUE-ADDED TAX (VAT), AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 109 OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Intends to alleviate the burden of fuel price hikes on the Filipino people thereby increasing the purchasing power of the public, especially those who belong to the lowest strata of our society.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-29
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
